column4: is there any way i can have a whole of UBuntu on my usb stick like BartPE
Yeah. Just set it as the install point.
Latest will work, but it'd be live mode. An install would bloat to fill that twice over.
you'd be basically copying a live cd to the thumbstick. It'd run fine, but like a live cd. If you want a built distro, look for damnsmall linux, or google about for slimming ubuntu down.
